actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT O.Ordername, 
    OrderSize, 
    Price1, Product1, P1JAS, P1Peices, P1Length, P1JAS * Price1 as P1Cost,
    Price2, Product2, P2JAS, P2Peices, P2Length, P2JAS * Price2 as P2Cost,
    Price3, Product3, P3JAS, P3Peices, P3Length, P3JAS * Price3 as P3Cost, 
    Price4, Product4, P4JAS, P4Peices, P4Length, P4JAS * Price4 as P4Cost,
    Price5, Product5, P5JAS, P5Peices, P5Length, P5JAS * Price5 as P5Cost,
		P1JAS * Price1 + P2JAS * Price2 + P3JAS * Price3 + P4JAS * Price4 + P5JAS * Price5 as TCOST,
    Peices, TJAS, TLength FROM
	(SELECT Ordername, OrderSize, Product1, Price1, Product2, Price2, Product3, Price3, Product4, Price4, Product5, Price5  
	 FROM Orders
	 JOIN Shipment ON Orders.ShipmentID = Shipment.ShipmentID 
	 WHERE Orders.ShipmentID = {{SelectShipmentDispatch.selectedOptionValue}}) O
	 LEFT JOIN 
	 (SELECT 
		  Ordername,
		  SUM(JAS) as TJAS,
			SUM(Length) as TLength,
		  COUNT(Log) as Peices
		FROM Scaling GROUP BY Ordername) S
	 ON O.Ordername = S.Ordername
LEFT JOIN 
	 (SELECT 
		  Grade,
		  Ordername,
		  SUM(JAS) as P1JAS,
		  SUM(Length) as P1Length,
		  COUNT(Log) as P1Peices
		FROM Scaling GROUP BY Ordername, Grade) R
	 ON O.Ordername = R.Ordername AND R.Grade = Product1
LEFT JOIN 
	 (SELECT 
		  Grade,
		  Ordername,
		  SUM(JAS) as P2JAS,
		  SUM(Length) as P2Length,
		  COUNT(Log) as P2Peices
		FROM Scaling GROUP BY Ordername, Grade) Q
	 ON O.Ordername = Q.Ordername AND Q.Grade = Product2
LEFT JOIN 
	 (SELECT 
		  Grade,
		  Ordername,
		  SUM(JAS) as P3JAS,
		  SUM(Length) as P3Length,
		  COUNT(Log) as P3Peices
		FROM Scaling GROUP BY Ordername, Grade) T
	 ON O.Ordername = T.Ordername AND T.Grade = Product3
LEFT JOIN 
	 (SELECT 
		  Grade,
		  Ordername,
		  SUM(JAS) as P4JAS,
		  SUM(Length) as P4Length,
		  COUNT(Log) as P4Peices
		FROM Scaling GROUP BY Ordername, Grade) U
	 ON O.Ordername = U.Ordername AND U.Grade = Product4
LEFT JOIN 
	 (SELECT 
		  Grade,
		  Ordername,
		  SUM(JAS) as P5JAS,
		  SUM(Length) as P5Length,
		  COUNT(Log) as P5Peices
		FROM Scaling GROUP BY Ordername, Grade) V
	 ON O.Ordername = V.Ordername AND V.Grade = Product5;
